dcterms:description: A public dataset with 14 robotic surgery videos from MICCAI Endoscopic Vision Challenge, containing VQLA annotations including QA pairs and bounding box annotations.
dcterms:title: EndoVis 2018 Dataset

dcterms:description: A publicly available dataset from the MICCAI Endoscopic Vision Challenge 2017, used as an external validation dataset with manually selected and annotated frames.
dcterms:title: EndoVis 2017 Dataset
